com.ctrlaltelite.pos.models

Class OrderItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.models.OrderItem

  • public class OrderItem
extends Object
    Represents an OrderItem in the POS system.

      • OrderItem

        public OrderItem(int orderItemId,
                 int orderId,
                 Integer menuItemId,
                 Integer comboId,
                 int quantity,
                 double price)
        Constructs a new OrderItem with the specified details.
        Parameters:
        orderItemId - the unique identifier of the OrderItem
        orderId - the identifier of the associated Order
        menuItemId - the identifier of the associated MenuItem (nullable)
        comboId - the identifier of the associated Combo (nullable)
        quantity - the quantity of the item ordered
        price - the price of the item
